title: 14 day ban expired yet I am still banned...
body:
Hello, my 14 day ban on my account was supposed to expire on 29/9/2016 at 15:29.

It is now many hours after this time yet I am still 14 day banned. Please fix this issue asap.

Thanks.

replies.body: Suspension periods include the time as well as the date itself, and is in pacific time.  Looking into this, there's still a couple hours left.  If you have any questions about the suspension or suspension periods, feel free to reach to the community on the [PB boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) or the player behavior team individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Best of luck!

Please look into my ticket and post on "player behavior and moderation" I just got suspended for 2 weeks with no details in the email. It was my first game of the day and I was able to play fine all yesterday and last night. I have never done anything wrong on the account. Thanks
